headline: 2 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Buffett missed out on Amazon at first, but now Berkshire is profiting from the stock.  Pool Corp. provides a consistent revenue stream and dividend.  The legendary investor took over a struggling textile company, Berkshire Hathaway, in 1965 and turned it into a massive conglomerate with holdings in insurance, healthcare, finance, automotive, consumer goods, and more.
